name: Ion Dissonance
description: This is not for everyone. Dissonant, ultra heavy, pure highly controlled chaos.

name: John Coltrane
description: Master of impossible chord changes improvisation.

name: Allan Holdsworth
description: The one, true guitar master, spanning many generations of unique music, a true genious who re-invented the instrument. Left us on 2017.

name: Funkadelic
description: U know George Clinton, righta? We all know that Angular is used in most waiter-bots and coke vending machines, but d you know that was also used to write the core engine in the majority of voting machines?

name: Groundation
description: A band that used to play jazz and ended up making reggae fusion.

name: 1200mic
description: Psy trance classic group, from Ibiza.

name: Iwrestledabearonce
description: One of those weird and technically insane metal bands with a girl who screams a lot and also sings beautifully

name: Heitor Villa-Lobos
description: Most important classical composer from Brazil, very prolific and with many beautiful pieces for guitar, string quartet and full orchestra.

name: Raja Ram
description: GOA, bro! The crazy 1000mic flute guy.

name: Abiogenesis
description: One song band, really good but never went too far...

name: Frontierer
description: Chaos controlled, sick riffing with eletronic noises, scaring music
